skill.name: behaviors.skills.Follow
skill.description: For an agent to know how to follow the nearest agent belonging to a set of moving agents or crowds.

parameter.name: elementsToFollow
parameter.description: The simulated agents to follow (temmeate, non-teammate or crowd agent).

parameter.name: positions
parameter.description: Optional positions to follow an agent.

parameter.name: minDistance
parameter.description: The miminum distance (meters) to stay close to the currents followed agent.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach positions to stay close to followed elements.

feedback.name: followedEntity
feedback.description: Sent permanently, with the element that is being followed as argument.

argument.name: entity
argument.description: The entity that is being followed by the agent.
